ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Demurrage/Misc Bill/Freight Bill Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Demurrage/Misc Bill/Freight Bill') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR(ISBLANK(NS_CorrectedAmount__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(TEXT(NS_TypeofError__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Corrected Amount, Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, and Type of Error prior to closing the Case.
